Talk_43:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>What have I seen...<sp:5:1:0>or heard...<sp:5:1:0> Someone must
need something...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
NakedPlayer_01: It takes all kinds, I guess.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Can I fill you in on anything here at
<clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>?
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:TalkPositive_00>You must have seen the <clr:0000>Zonai ruin<clr:ffff> that
fell into <clr:0000>Lookout Landing's pond<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Luckily no one was hurt.


<snd:Happy_01>The ruin offers a rare opportunity to read
a message written in ancient Hyrulean.
The Zonai Survey Team is studying it!
You might want to take a look for yourself
if you haven't already.
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>I hear Mubs is getting new items in stock.
You might want to stop by!
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>Have you spoken to <clr:0000>Buliara<clr:ffff> of the
Gerudo? <sp:5:1:0>She can tell you some
<clr:0000>interesting facts about weapons<clr:ffff>.
I'm telling you, the things I've learned
from being here!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Happy_01>Goodness, Link. I didn't know that
<clr:0000>Skyview Tower <clr:ffff>could blast someone
into the air. Incredible!
I saw you hurtling through the sky from
right here!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>Glad to have you back, Link!


My name is Scorpis. I have been charged
with managing <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>If you have any questions about the place,
any at all, come right to me. I will answer
as best I can.
<snd:Chat_01>Now please, allow me to open up the
<clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>.
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Listen to this.


I was speaking to <clr:0000>Gralens <clr:ffff>in the
<clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>'s monster-control-
crew headquarters.
He's trying to learn what he can about
large <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>But it's probably nothing <sp:5:1:0>serious. I'm sure
he has it under control...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>This underground vault used to be an
<clr:0000>emergency shelter <clr:ffff>for the royal family.
Now we're making constant use of it.
Feel free to make yourself at home in our
vault. Use any equipment you want.
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>The other day <clr:0000>Harth<clr:ffff> of the Rito told me
about the <clr:0000>sky islands<clr:ffff> he's seen.<sp:0:4:0>I really do learn all sorts of things from
being here.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Purah turned Lookout Landing into the
central base for coordinating efforts to
<clr:0000>find Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>.
Originally, she established this fort to
study the gloom that started seeping
from Hyrule Castle.
Only researchers and members of the
Zonai Survey Team worked here.

But once the princess went missing,
everyone wanted to help, so they've
been coming in ever since.
We're like one big, growing family.
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Chat_01>Lord <clr:0000>Muzu<clr:ffff> of the Zora is a font of
knowledge! <sp:5:0:0>But what would you expect
from someone who's been alive so long?
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I feel like I've learned so much since I
came here. It's great!
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Chat_01>Be careful not to bump into any of the
Goron children.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Oh, but excuse me! I'll let you through
to the <clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>.
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>There you are! I was waiting! Could you
please hurry over to <clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff>?

She's using the <clr:0000>telescope <clr:ffff>to search for
the princess!
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_00>Now that you mention it, I was speaking
to Lester from the mini stable nearby.

He looked haggard, and he was muttering
that his <clr:0000>horse had run away<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>That's worrisome, considering the number
of monsters around Lookout Landing.

I hope he finds it soon.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>As you come and go, you might find new
facilities popping up here, thanks to
<clr:0000>Hudson Construction<clr:ffff>.
It's nice to see this place changing to
meet our needs.
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Link...<sp:5:0:0>we heard about the Demon King.


Needless to say, things have been a bit
tense around here since the news broke.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>But never fear! We're as committed to our
duties as ever!

We won't stop doing everything we can to
defend Lookout Landing.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Like I've said to the others—<sp:5:0:0>why fear
some rinky-dink Demon King when we
have the princess of Hyrule on our side?
So don't worry about us, Link. You just
make sure Princess Zelda gets back safe
and sound.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Greeting_00>Excellent work out there, Link. Not that I
expected less.

But enough out of me! You want to go to
the <clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>, right?
Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>Unbelievable. How does a Goron forget
the way to <clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>?

Granted, since the lava cooled, the
scenery did change quite a bit.

Still, it's easy enough to find the city.
You just use <clr:0000>Death Mountain <clr:ffff>in the
northeast as a <clr:0000>landmark<clr:ffff>.
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>If ever you lose your way, speak with
<clr:0000>Atmus<clr:ffff> in the emergency shelter.

He has a <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff> to show you just where
you need to go.

Anyway, sorry to talk your ear off there.
Did you need anything?
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>I was just telling this traveler the way to
<clr:0000>Goron City<clr:ffff>.

It used to be pretty simple—you could
turn toward Death Mountain and keep
walking till you got there.
However, since the lava started cooling,
<clr:0000>new roads <clr:ffff>have appeared all around
Death Mountain.
More than a few travelers have gotten
mixed up.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>But listen to me, going on and on about
our problems.

Can I help you?
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>It used to be simple—you could turn
toward <clr:0000>Death Mountain <clr:ffff>and keep walking
till you got there.
But since the eruptions stopped, lava
all over the mountain has cooled, making
a confusing tangle of <clr:0000>new roads<clr:ffff>.
More than a few travelers have gotten
mixed up.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>But listen to me, going on and on about
our problems. <sp:5:1:0>Can I help you?
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Link?<sp:5:0:0> Wh-where have you been this
whole time?!<sp:0:4:0>We hoped you'd come back soon, but
then you didn't...<sp:5:0:0>and now you have!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>Where's <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>? You didn't
bring her with you?
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:TalkPositive_00>Ah! Have you spoken to <clr:0000>Mubs<clr:ffff>,
the <clr:0000>merchant<clr:ffff>?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>There's a terrible crisis in her hometown.
She's been worried sick about the safety
of her fellow villagers.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00>Poor woman.
Talk_01:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Angry_01><clr:ffff>Whatever happened, please go talk to
<clr:0000>Purah<clr:ffff> first and foremost.<sp:0:4:0>She's up in her research lab. <sp:5:1:0>That's on
the north side of our fort, up on the
<clr:0000>second floor<clr:ffff>. Hurry!
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah! Link, did you hear about the <clr:0000>hidden
passage<clr:ffff> that was found in the
<clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>?
The tunnel's quite old and neglected—<sp:5:0:0>
it looks ready to cave in at any moment.
I think we'd all do well to stay away.
Since it was found, <clr:0000>Jerrin<clr:ffff>, who's in charge
of cleaning, has been acting strange. As if
she's scared of something.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>She was always so chipper before too.
I wonder what could have happened.
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Well, the other day I heard Josha and
Robbie talking.

Josha was upset and asking Robbie why
he wouldn't allow her to <clr:0000>investigate
the Depths<clr:ffff>.
<snd:Think_00>I'm sure she'd have a lot of insights if she
went down there, considering how brilliant
she is.
But she's still very young, so it wasn't
surprising to me that she's not allowed
to go down there herself.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I spoke to someone from Hudson
Construction. He's having a hard time
finishing construction on our <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>What was the fellow's name?
Clarkson? Karlson?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I can't recall. But all of those Hudson
Construction workers have names that
end in "son."
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Did you hear? <clr:0000>Josha<clr:ffff> is recruiting for her
<clr:0000>chasm research team<clr:ffff>!

I don't know any details, but it sounds
as if they made an amazing discovery.

A few interviewees went to meet with
her, but they all walked away with
slumped shoulders.
<snd:Chat_00>I wonder who'll get the job. It would
take quite a résumé to impress a genius
like Josha.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>We here at the emergency shelter have a
rule: the newest team member has to do
the <clr:0000>cooking<clr:ffff>.
Our current cook has been grumbling that
after coming up with a new <clr:0000>menu <clr:ffff>every
day, he's starting to run out of ideas.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_00>Reminds me of my time as cook.<sp:5:0:0> After a while,
I gave up and started throwing apples on the fire.<sp:0:2:2:6400>

<sp:3:0:2:0400>Hm? Oh, sorry. I was <sp:5:0:0>reminiscing.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Sorry I didn't greet you properly when
you first arrived here, Link. I was just so
relieved to see you.
My name is Scorpis. I've been charged
with managing <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>.

If you have any questions about the place,
any at all, come right to me. I'll answer as
best I can.
<snd:Chat_01>Now please, allow me to open up the
<clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Chat_01>I don't think there's anything that we
need help with currently.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm sure that's because you're here
now, Link.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>So thank you for checking in with us here
at the fort. I know you're busy.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll be here at my post awaiting Princess
Zelda in the meantime. So if you need
anything, you know where to find me.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Lookout Landing was built on top of the
royal family's <clr:0000>emergency shelter<clr:ffff>.

We don't have much equipment in there,
but we do have essentials like <clr:0000>beds <clr:ffff>and a
<clr:0000>cooking pot<clr:ffff>. Feel free to use those.<sp:0:4:0>If you need <clr:0000>armor <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>cooking ingredients<clr:ffff>
for your travels, you'll find all that at
Mubs's shop up here.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>I'm as overjoyed as the next Hylian that
Princess Zelda was found, <sp:5:1:0>but...<sp:0:4:0>How are we going to reach her?
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>Link!<sp:5:0:0> I'm so happy to see you've
safely returned!
Talk_40:
Some unfortunate weather we're having.
You're faring well, I hope? Haven't been
struck by lightning or anything like that?
